title: ADULT & NON FORMAL EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) subjects.
subjects: English Language and any three (3) subjects.

title: ARABIC/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Arabic and English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, any other subject.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ARABIC/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other subject.
subjects: Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: BIOLOGY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.

title: BIOLOGY/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Biology and any other Science subject.

title: CHEMISTRY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Biology, Physics, General Science/Mathematics.

title: CHEMISTRY/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology/Physics.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Integrated Science and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science and Chemistry.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics and Chemistry.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits including English Language.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: ENGLISH (DOUBLE MAJOR)

subjects: Literature in English and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: ENGLISH/FRENCH

title: ENGLISH/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Islamic Studies, Literature in English and one (1) Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Yoruba and any Arts subject.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, French and any  other two (2)  Arts subjects.
subjects: French and any  other two (2) Art subjects.

title: HAUSA/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa, Islamic Studies  and any Arts subject.

title: HAUSA/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) of

1. Geography

2. History/Government

3. Islamic Studies/Christian Religious Studies

4. Economics
subjects: Hausa and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE  (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Chemistry and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE / MATHEMATICS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following

1. Biology/Agricultural Science

2. Chemistry

3. Physics and

4. General Science
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/PHYSICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics Physics and any two (2) Science subjects
subjects: Physics and any other  two (2) Science subjects.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) of

1. Economics

2. Government/History

3. Geography
subjects: Islamic Studies, Government/History and any one (1)  Social/Arts Subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/PHYSICS

subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credits including English Language.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.

title: YORUBA/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History, Yoruba and one (1)   Arts/subject.
subjects: Yoruba, Government/History and one (1)Arts/Social Science.
